0001.name: Merchant of the Deep
0001.mfx: When you draw two or more cards at the same time; you can draw one additional card.
0001.afx: You can discard one blue card; draw two cards.

0002.name: Tiger Lily
0002.mfx: After this card attacks; its ATK gets decreased by 1.
0002.efx: Any unit that attacks the equipped card takes 1 damage after damage calculation.

0003.name: Martian Hunter
0003.mfx: If this unit destroys a unit by battle; it gains 1 ATK.
0003.afx: If you control a WARRIOR unit, target a WARRIOR unit you control and one of your opponent's units; destroy both of them.

0004.name: Yo-Yo-Yo
0004.mfx: After this card battles and it is not destroyed; return it to the hand, then you can play one card that has stats totalling 3 or less from your hand as a unit. Its effects are negated and it is destroyed at the end of your turn.
0004.afx: You can discard one card; play this card as a unit.

0005.name: Bedrock Breaker
0005.mfx: When this card battles; if you control another MACHINE unit, this unit gains attack equal to the attack of the unit it is battling for that battle only.
0005.afx: If you control only MACHINE units (min. 1); You can destroy one unit your opponent controls whose health is higher than its attack.

0006.name: Merchant of the Skies
0006.mfx: When you draw two or more cards at the same time; You can return one card your opponent controls to the hand.
0006.afx: You can send this card to the graveyard; draw two cards.

0007.name: Toxic Toadstool
0007.mfx: When this unit is destroyed by battle; the unit that destroyed this card has its health set to 1.
0007.afx: You can send this card to the graveyard; all units on the field have their health set to 1.

0008.name: River Dragon
0008.mfx: This card gains ATK and health equal to the number of cards you have on the field other than this one.
0008.afx: You can send this card to the GY, add one card from your GY to your hand.

0009.name: The King's Vineyard
0009.mfx: If a unit attacks this unit; it cannot attack during its controller's next turn.
0009.afx: All PLANT units you control gain 2 health.

0010.name: Merchant's Guild
0010.mfx: You draw 2 cards instead of 1 for your normal draw.
0010.afx: All MERCHANT units you control gain 1 ATK and health for each unique MERCHANT card you control.

0011.name: Jewellery Jelly
0011.mfx: When this unit is destroyed by battle; You can add 1 MINERAL card to your hand.
0011.afx: When your opponent declares a direct attack; you can play this card as a unit, but its health is set to 1.

0012.name: Facetious Falcon
0012.mfx: Your opponent's units can only attack this unit. If this card is attacked, the attacking unit takes damage equal to this card's ATK.
0012.afx: Target one PLANT Aux card; send it and this card to the GY.

0013.name: Gavin the Righteous
0013.mfx: You can pay any amount of mana; this unit gains attack equal to the amount of mana you paid for the rest of this turn.
0013.afx: You can pay 2 mana, all WARRIOR units you control gain 1 ATK.

0014.name: Great Grinders
0014.mfx: You can send any number of MACHINE cards from your hand to the GY; this unit gains 2 attack for each.
0014.afx: You can send this card to the GY; send one of your opponent's Aux cards to the GY.

0015.name: Merchant of the Tundra
0015.mfx: When you draw two or more cards at the same time; you can make the ATK of one of your opponent's units 0.
0015.afx: You can make the ATK of all your units 0 for the rest of this turn; draw 2 cards.

0016.name: Merchant of the Scorched
0016.mfx: When you draw two or more cards at the same time; you can deal 2 damage to one of your opponent's units.
0016.afx: You can discard two cards; draw two cards.

0017.name: Carl the Crazed Conjurer
0017.mfx: You can discard 2 cards; all Aux cards on the field are destroyed.
0017.afx: You can send another Aux card you control to the GY; add a MAGIC card to your hand.

0018.name: The Living Scimitar
0018.mfx: You can send this unit to the GY; deal 4 damage to any unit on the field.
0018.efx: The equipped unit gains 2 ATK. If the equipped unit is attacked; you can send this card to the GY, it is not destroyed.

0019.name: The Hounds of Hades
0019.mfx: When this unit battles; you can play a 'The Hounds of Hades' from your deck as a unit, but it is destroyed at the end of this turn.
0019.afx: You can send this card to the GY; a unit you control gains 1 ATK.

0020.name: Water that hates Magic
0020.mfx: When this unit battles a MAGIC unit; it gains 3 ATK
0020.afx: While you control at least 4 BLUE cards, MAGIC cards cannot attack.

0021.name: Pessimistic Penguin
0021.mfx: Each player can only control 1 non-ANIMAL unit.
0021.afx: All units each player controls lose 1 ATK for each of their non-ANIMAL units.

0022.name: Merchant of Sins
0022.mfx: When you draw two or more cards at the same time; your opponent gains one less mana at the start of their next turn only.
0022.afx: You can pay 3 mana; draw 2 cards.

0023.name: VERY BIG TURRET
0023.mfx: This unit can make attacks on units equal to the number of MACHINE units you control.
0023.afx: When your opponent plays a unit; deal 1 damage to it.

0024.name: The Librarian
0024.mfx: You play 1 less mana to play cards in the Aux slot.
0024.afx: When another card in your Aux slot would be destroyed; it is not.

0025.name: Son of a Shepherd
0025.mfx: All ANIMAL units whose original ATK is less than 3 gain 1 ATK.
0025.afx: All non-ANIMAL units whose original ATK is more than 3 lose 1 ATK.
